name: Circle Rally Party
detailed_description:
Circle Rally Party is a 1 to 4 players local multiplayer party game with mini games about doing donuts with cars. Use your car's unique attack at the right time, and collect power-ups to improve your odds. Traffic rules do not apply!




This game offers you:

  • Play alone or with up to 4 players locally
  • Fast, configurable rounds with co-op elements. For example, rescue opponents from a trap to earn free points!
  • Attack opponents with your car's unique attack and eventually wreck them
  • Multiple mini games related to doing donuts with cars
  • Colorful graphics
  • Training Mode where you can raise your own skills
  • Play online with friends via Parsec

This game does not contain:

  • Online multiplayer without any third party tool (e.g. Parsec)
  • Bots
  • AAA 3D graphics
  • Lootboxes
  • Microtransactions





As the party leader, you define your own rules at the beginning of each match. Choose which mini game, map and amount of time you wish to play. Do you only want to play 1 round of 48 seconds? We've got you covered!

If you've chosen to play multiple rounds per match, a new - randomly chosen - power-up will be added to the next round(s). This will make each round increasingly more difficult.

At the end of a match everyone receives bonus points for their in-game actions. This means it isn't known who'll win the match until the match has been finished. You may have unlocked some new content as well..

Mini games

  • Classic

    How many donuts are you able to do with your car in at least 48 seconds? Hopefully your opponents won't mess with you (rare circumstance). Fortunately, there are power-ups to improve your odds!

  • Color the Wheel

    This mini game is like Classic, but it requires a bit more skills. Color as much wheels as you can by doing donuts around them. Don't stop defending your previously colored wheels, because your opponents can steal points from you by re-coloring them

  • Circle Slam

    Stay on the target for the longest time. Smash other cars away with, for example, a boxing glove. This mini game brings more battle style to the game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 2.0Ghz or any equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: XBox (360, One) or PlayStation controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5-7xxx 2.5Ghz or any equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD7770 or any equivalent
  • Storage: 275 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: XBox (360, One) controller recommended
